item.title: Union Budget 2026 Explained: What's Getting Cheaper, What's Getting Costlier & What It All Means for You
item.description: Union Budget 2026 complete breakdown - cancer drugs free, phones cheaper, F&O trading costlier. What does this budget mean for salaried employees, investors, students, and common people? Real analysis from an engineering professor.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
## Privacy Policy

**Last Updated:** February 2, 2026

### Information Collection

This website uses:

- **Google Analytics** to understand visitor behavior

- **Cookies** for basic functionality

- No personal data is sold or shared

### Advertising

We use Google AdSense which may use cookies to display relevant ads.

### Contact

Questions? Email: chandrashakerarrabotu@gmail.com
